attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Elias is now 4 years old.Sarah met johnny while in Newcastle in 1997,Elias was born 19 December 2001.Elias travelled to Beirut to meet the family and then his father took him twice in the first year of his life to Beirut.Johnny then took Elias back to Beirut for what Sarah was meant to believe was a holiday.Two weeks were up Sarah recieved a phone call to say Johnny would not return back to England.

Christmas 2005 Johnny passed away.Sarah went to Beirut to get Elias  but was not allowed.Sarah had phone contact with Elias,since he has been sent to a Lebanese school without Sarahs permission it is very difficult for Sarah to communicate with Elias.Sarah's family have not seen elias since 2002, they have are a few pictures to remind them of what he looks like.All Sarah has now are pictures of he son.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
